entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:11 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
